name: Bad Robots
description:
Find all 4 keys located in rooms around the ship and bring them back to the command room one at a time to reset the power! Watch out below! The Robots are disassembling all the floors! Destroy any Robots in your path!

Designer/ Programmer - Eric Garcia

Programmer - Malachias Harris 

Music/SFX/Team lead - Stephen Halsey - https://www.arcitecaudio.com/

3d Modeler - Adham abdel kader(edited)

Texture Artist - Anny Lai
